thread.title: Kylie Minogue splits from fiance actor Joshua Sasse
thread.title_full: Kylie Minogue splits from fiance actor Joshua Sasse

title: Kylie Minogue splits from fiance actor Joshua Sasse
text:
Kylie Minogue splits from fiance actor Joshua Sasse Last updated 13:00, February 3 2017 @kylieminogue/INSTAGRAM 
As one relationship ends another begins. Kylie Minogue has singed a new deal with record label BMG as it is reported the pop star are her fiance have split up. 
Pop star Kylie Minogue has reportedly split from her fiance, the British actor Joshua Sasse. 
The Can't Get You Out Of My Head singer, 48, met Sasse, 29, in 2015 on the set of US series Galavant , in which he stars and she was making a guest appearance. 
The pair announced their engagement in February 2016. 
But according to The Sun , the Australian star has broken off the engagement because she suspects Sasse of cheating with another actress.
